wps.re_sort: [ wps : ID reassigned due to Waypoint count mismatch ]
wps.wp.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete it? This operation cannot be undone!
wps.regist: [ wps : Player information has been registered ]
wps.item.lore1: If you throw this item, you will get a waypoint where you throw it.
wps.item.lore2: You can change the waypoint name by changing the item name.
wps.item.lore3: *Name can be up to 35 characters long if modified with Anvil
